definition: to urge/to press/to prompt/to rush sb/to hasten sth/to expedite
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Lanthanide trichlorides display no catalytic effect on the hydrogenation of potassium in presence of naphthalene.
sentences.chinese: 稀土氯化物对金属钾的氢化反应不显示催化作用。

sentences.english: The extremozymes are able to take biocatalytic effect under various extreme conditions.
sentences.chinese: 极端酶能在各种极端环境中起生物催化作用。

sentences.english: Catalysis has increased the rate of reaction .
sentences.chinese: 催化作用提高了反应的速度。

sentences.english: Enzymatic catalysis in non-aqueous phase was one of the most important field in enzyme engineering.
sentences.chinese: 非水相中酶的催化作用是酶工程研究的热点之一。

sentences.english: The structural features and catalytic activities of macrocycles are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 对大环化合物的结构特点及催化作用进行了综述。

sentences.english: The hydrogenation of alkali metals using lanthanide trichloride and naphthalene as catalyst has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了稀土氯化物对碱金属氢化反应的催化作用。

sentences.english: PP1 has evolved effective catalytic machinery but lacks substrate specificity.
sentences.chinese: PP1演变了有效的催化作用但缺乏底物特异性。

sentences.english: This paper gave an overall review of the application of lewis acid catalytic on various drug synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 总结了路易斯酸在各种药物合成反应中的催化作用。

sentences.english: The mechanism of hexa- coordinate phosphorus intermediate explains the catalytic effect of imidazole.
sentences.chinese: 六配位磷机理比较好地解释了咪唑的催化作用。

sentences.english: But in the end, a donor can only act as catalyst.
sentences.chinese: 但是，捐助方最终只能起到催化作用。

sentences.english: The reason may be that the catalyst catalyzed the diamond reversely at high temperature.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是由于在高温下触媒的反催化作用引起的。

definition: to act on/to affect/action/function/activity/impact/result/effect/purpose/intent/to play a role/corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization/CL:個|个[ge4]
